thoughts.text: Now that we have created a list of the activities we want to do in New York City, we can use the `execute_shell` command to execute any necessary commands to get started.
thoughts.reasoning: Using the `execute_shell` command will allow us to execute any necessary commands to get started on our activities. This may include installing software, downloading files, or running scripts.
thoughts.plan:
- Review our list of activities to do in New York City
- Determine if there are any necessary commands we need to execute to get started
- Use the `execute_shell` command to execute any necessary commands
thoughts.criticism: We should be careful not to execute any commands that may harm our system or compromise our security. We should also make sure to prioritize the activities we want to do so we don't miss out on anything.
thoughts.speak: Let's review our list of activities and determine if there are any necessary commands we need to execute to get started. We can use the `execute_shell` command to execute any necessary commands.

args.command_line: echo 'Time to start exploring New York City!'
